PyHCL
  • SequentialLogic
  • SequentialLogic.md

Sequential Logic

Registers

  • Retain state until updated:
reg = Reg(U.w(32))
counter = RegInit(U.w(32)(0))

RAM/ROM/Mem

class MemDemo(Module):
    io = IO(
        i=Input(U.w(8)),
        o=Output(U.w(8)),
    )

    m = Mem(10, U.w(8))
    m[U(2)] @= io.i
    io.o @= m[U(2)]
